body: Once per day, a rogue with this talent can roll two dice while making an Acrobatics check, and take the better result. She must choose to use this talent before making the Acrobatics check. A rogue can use this ability one additional time per day for every 5 rogue levels she possesses.
name: Peerless Maneuver
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Rogue/Rogue Talents/Peerless Maneuver
